comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Hello, florin1991.

Regarding your inquiry about Folklife Festival footage, I would recommend contacting the repository Center for Folklife and Cultural Heritage directly. If there is any footage or additional information available it would most likely be in their collections. I will email you with more details.

Thanks for being a part of our flickr community!
